description: A mobile app to generate consistent randomized passwords. Used Ionic, Angular.JS.

An NPM module to facilitate building simple Twitter bots. Used Node.JS, Twitter API, Gulp, Mocha, Chai.

GitHub: https://github.com/lexm/twitter-bot

A single-page website to locate nearby pet shelters.

GitHub: https://github.com/lexm/Catpanion

A timed math game where every correct answer earns you a kitty. A Cheezburger fave.

Meow.

Won 3rd place out of 6 teams in Seattle Sports Tech Hackathon. KnowHuddle is a sports app that lets you predict the next play in the game and then integrates real-time sports data to add or subtract points based on the accuracy of your prediction.

Earned Honorable Mention out of 12 teams at Hack for Healthcare Hackathon. Rx Report tracks prescription drug use, reminds users if they miss a dose, and enables reporting of side effects and adverse reactions.
